availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Samuel L. Auxier and Rebecca Phillips Auxier. Married to Hester A. Auxier. Father of Samuel L. Auxier, David Auxier, George W. Auxier, Louisa Auxier, Andrew J. Auxier, Julia Auxier, Thomas J. Auxier, Martha Auxier, Hannah Auxier, Angeline Auxier, and James B. Auxier. Farmer in Johnson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Johnson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 120A.
